## You Can Rebuild Everything From Public Memory â€” That Changes the Game

What happens when your entire publishing system can be erasedâ€”and rebuiltâ€”from public memory alone? This essay explores why true durability is not about backups, platforms, or promises of permanence, but about regenerability. Rehydration changes the power dynamics of publishing, identity, and creative ownership in a way most people still donâ€™t see.

tags: You Can Rebuild Everything From Public Memory â€” That Changes the Game

What happens when your entire publishing system can be erasedâ€”and rebuiltâ€”from public memory alone? This essay explores why true durability is not about backups, platforms, or promises of permanence, but about regenerability. Rehydration changes the power dynamics of publishing, identity, and creative ownership in a way most people still donâ€™t see.
